user_query: I'm hosting a music-themed trivia night for my company's team-building event. Can you suggest popular songs from the Austria Songs chart? Also, provide trivia questions about these songs to challenge the participants. Additionally, recommend a venue in our area that can accommodate a large group for the event.

TaskList.description: Retrieve the latest popular songs from the Austria Songs chart.
Generate trivia questions based on the retrieved songs.
Search for a venue that can accommodate a large group for the event.
